document.full_text: a. j. burnett held kansas city to one hit in seven innings, but the yankees went 2 for 16 with men in scoring position and left 15 runners on base.
document.title: royals 4, yankees 3 (11 innings): yankees betrayed by their bats and their bullpen
lines_and_colors: a. j. burnett held kansas city to one hit in seven innings, but the yankees went 2 for 16 with men in scoring position and left 15 runners on base.
